front.title: Prefix Flag Extension for OSPFv2 and OSPFv3

abstract.t: Each OSPF prefix can be advertised with an 8-bit field to indicate specific properties of that prefix. However, all the OSPFv3 Prefix Options bits have already been assigned and only a few bits remain unassigned in the flags field of the OSPFv2 Extended Prefix TLV. This document solves the problem of insufficient prefix options bits by defining variable-length Prefix Attribute Flags Sub-TLV for OSPF.
